src:
Klasemen Liga Champions 2019, Di Mana Tim Kesayanganmu?
04 Nov 2019, 15:58 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Matchday keempat Liga Champions 2019/20 akan bergulir pada tengah pekan ini. Tim-tim kontestan siap menunjukkan penampilan terbaiknya untuk memperbaiki posisi mereka di klasemen Liga Champions.
Saat ini, klasemen Liga Champions dari Grup A hingga H masih dikuasai tim-tim raksasa. Paris Saint Germain, Bayern Munchen, Manchester City, Juventus, hingga Barcelona masih mendominasi grup mereka masing-masing.
Sementara tim-tim seperti Galatasaray, Olympiakos, Atalanta atau Bayer Leverkusen masih kesulitan beranjak dari dasar klasemen.
Namun begitu, bukan berarti tertutup sudah peluang tim-tim lainnya untuk menduduki puncak singgasana. Apalagi, masih banyak pertandingan yang bisa mereka jadikan ladang poin.
Sebelum menyaksikan serunya matchday keempat, ada baiknya kita lihat dulu posisi klasemen Liga Champions dari Grup A hingga G berikut ini.
text:
2019 Champions League Standings, Where Are Your Favorite Teams?
Nov 04 2019, 15:58 by Bola.net
Soccer - 2019/20 Champions League fourth matchday will roll in the middle of this week. The contestant teams are ready to show their best performances to improve their position in the Champions League standings.
Currently, the Champions League standings from Group A to H are still controlled by giant teams. Paris Saint Germain, Bayern Munich, Manchester City, Juventus, to Barcelona still dominate their respective groups.
While teams such as Galatasaray, Olympiakos, Atalanta or Bayer Leverkusen still have difficulty moving from the bottom of the standings.
However, that does not mean that other teams have the opportunity to occupy the top of the throne. Moreover, there are still many matches that they can make a point field.
Before witnessing the thrill of the fourth matchday, it helps us see the position of the Champions League standings from Group A to G below.
